That's the sixth solitary-headed consciousness.
pervasively conditioned by all.
It's because they don't discriminate and cling.
The second is to imagine that it's not pervasive.
That's the seventh consciousness.
It's because it's only conditioned by the store consciousness that gives rise to conceptualization.
Three, it's also pervasive and calculated.
In the sixth cause of consciousness, there's this.
There's pervasive imagination.
Fourth, it's neither conceptualized nor pervasive.
That is, the five consciousnesses are only perceptual objects.
five dust motes...
It's because there's no calculation.
The first five consciousnesses are free to realize objects.
They don't carry words or names.
It's because it's only presently measured.
So it is with the eighth.
Record of the Axiom Mirror, Volume 5, Volume 25

source_sentence: 戊申歲分司大藏都監開板
translation: On the opening board of the Tripiṭaka Master Daizang, director of the yearly division of Wushan
